context.custom_context: Heartbreak, danger, falling, losing control, ghost of love

verse_1: Roses are red, my heart turned gray,
My hands still reach but you slip away.
Maybe I couldn't hold your flame,
Maybe your fire is just a game.
My baby don't see the tears I hide.
verse_2: The pain runs deep, the wound won't mend,
The more it burns, the more I pretend.
chorus: Through shadows of a haunted past.
verse_3: I speak to mirrors, they turn their face,
Your ghost still lingers in empty space.
Whispers of you curl like smoke,
Burning my heart with words you spoke.
chorus_repeat: Through shadows of a haunted past.
Maybe this chaos is all I hold.

metaphors: Roses are red, heart turned gray

mission_alignment.description: Spiritual battle, self-stewardship through danger, healing journey
